Compiling CoreData Python API

1. Compiling with Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2008

1. Compiling with Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2008

To compile the CoreData Python API:
  • Open a Visual Studio 2008 command prompt
  • cd to the pycoredata/src directory.
  • Type nmake -f Makefile.win32_ia32sse2_vc90 all to build release libraries.
  • The output binaries will be placed in pycoredata/lib/win32_ia32sse2_vc90.

To re-generate the SWIG wrappers:

  • Open a Visual Studio 2008 command prompt
  • cd to the pycoredata/src directory.
  • Make sure swig version 1.38 or later is in your path by typing swig --version
  • Type run-swig.bat to re-generate the wrappers.
  • Type nmake -f Makefile.win32_ia32sse2_vc90 all to build release libraries.
  • The output binaries will be placed in pycoredata/lib/win32_ia32sse2_vc90.
